Package org.jvault.factory

Class TypeVaultFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jvault.factory.TypeVaultFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
VaultFactory<VaultType>
@API @ThreadSafe public final class TypeVaultFactory extends Object implements VaultFactory<VaultType>
Class that receives (String or VaultFactoryBuildInfo) and VaultType together,
creates and returns a Vault implementation corresponding to the VaultType.
Since:
0.1
See Also:
  • VaultFactory
  • VaultFactoryBuildInfo

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <R extends Vault<?>>
    R
    get(String vaultName, VaultType vaultType)
    Returns the Vault interface implementation by receiving the vaultName and param(type of vault)
    This method is not to create a new vault, but to return the existing vault corresponding to the vaultName.
    <R extends Vault<?>>
    R
    get(VaultFactoryBuildInfo buildInfo, VaultType vaultType)
    Returns the Vault interface implementation class by receiving the VaultFactoryBuildInfo and param(type of vault)
    Vault Factory creates a new Vault based on VaultFactoryInfo.
    static TypeVaultFactory
    getInstance()
    The ClassVault Factory is managed by Singleton, and all constructors are private, so execute this method to obtain the ClassVaultFactory.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TypeVaultFactory getInstance()
      The ClassVault Factory is managed by Singleton, and all constructors are private, so execute this method to obtain the ClassVaultFactory.
      Returns:
      ClassVaultFactory

    • get

      public <R extends Vault<?>> R get(String vaultName, VaultType vaultType) throws IllegalStateException
      Description copied from interface: VaultFactory
      Returns the Vault interface implementation by receiving the vaultName and param(type of vault)
      This method is not to create a new vault, but to return the existing vault corresponding to the vaultName.
      If none of the vault matched with vaultName, throw IllegalStateException.
      Specified by:
      get in interface VaultFactory<VaultType>
      Type Parameters:
      R - The implementation of Vault.
      Parameters:
      vaultName - The name of the vault to be returned.
      vaultType - Type of vault to be created.
      Returns:
      ClassVault that implementation type of the Vault

      interface.

      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - Throw IllegalStateException if the corresponding vault does not exist for the vaultName.
      Since:
      0.1

    • get

      public <R extends Vault<?>> R get(VaultFactoryBuildInfo buildInfo, VaultType vaultType)
      Description copied from interface: VaultFactory
      Returns the Vault interface implementation class by receiving the VaultFactoryBuildInfo and param(type of vault)
      Vault Factory creates a new Vault based on VaultFactoryInfo.
      If a vault with the name corresponding to "VaultFactoryBuildInfo.getVaultName()" already exists, the vault is returned.
      Specified by:
      get in interface VaultFactory<VaultType>
      Type Parameters:
      R - The implementation of Vault.
      Parameters:
      buildInfo - The collection of information that VaultFactory needs to create Vault.
      vaultType - Type of vault to be created.
      Returns:
      Vault that implementation type of the Vault

      interface.

      Since:
      0.1
      See Also:
      • VaultFactoryBuildInfo
